title: Interview with Dr. Nicola Harding
description: In this episode, Matthew talks to Dr. Nicola Harding from Lancaster University. In part 1 Nicola discusses her long and winding route into the world of Sociology. In part 2 she outlines her wide variety of research in particular her work on women and punishment.
itunes:author: Matthew Wilkin
